alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Bryan; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY, MCINTOSH AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 500 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Sunbury, or 11 miles south of Coffee Bluff, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... St. Catherines Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Bryan; Inland Liberty
